Title: Title
observationDeletion.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the observation?
Select one of the two options below: use: Select one of the two options below: use an existing report or upload a new one.
Select a report from the report library: Select a report from the report library of your organization.
Alternatively, you can upload a new repo: Alternatively, you can upload a new report to the library and use it for this observation.
The file should weight less than 5MB: The file should weight less than 5MB
Select one of the two options below: use: Select one of the two options below: use an existing operator or create a new one.
Select an operator from the list below.
Alternatively, you can quickly add new o: Alternatively, you can quickly add new operator.
Please select a FMU or enter coordinates: Please select a FMU or enter coordinates below
Instead of clicking on the map or manual: Instead of clicking on the map or manually filling the coordinates, you can get them from a georeferenced photo. This photo won't be part of the observation.
When you upload a new file, it will appe: When you upload a new file, it will appear in the list of evidence.
imageGeoreference.error: The image can't be georeferenced, try another one.
